message.content:
# Cognition State

## Inherited Knowledge

Task 001 (data-model) completed:
- Card dataclass with id, front, back, next_review, interval fields
- SQLite table via fastlite: db = database("cards.db"), cards = db.create(Card, pk="id")
- main.py exists with Card model

## Operational State

Last sequence: 001
Recent: 001_data-model_complete.md

---

Campaign: Build flashcard app per README.md
Task: 002 routes-crud

Description: CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete
Delta: /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v26/main.py, /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v26/test_app.py
Done when: GET / redirects to /cards; GET /cards lists all cards; GET /cards/new shows form; POST /cards/new creates card; POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card; tests for card CRUD pass
Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

Routes from README:
| Route | Method | Behavior |
|-------|--------|----------|
| `/` | GET | Redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards` | GET | List all cards with front text |
| `/cards/new` | GET | Form to create new card |
| `/cards/new` | POST | Create card, redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards/{id}/delete` | POST | Delete card, redirect to `/cards` |

content.text: I'll create the workspace file for this campaign task.

- SM-2 spaced repetition algorithm
- Files: main.py, test_app.py

input.content:
# 002: CRUD Routes

## Implementation
Path: [HTTP Request] → [FastHTML Route] → [SQLite CRUD] → [Redirect/HTML Response]
Delta: /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v26/main.py, /Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v26/test_app.py
Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

## Thinking Traces

Campaign task 002: Add CRUD routes to main.py.

Inherited from task 001:
- Card dataclass exists with id, front, back, next_review, interval fields
- SQLite setup: db = database("cards.db"), cards = db.create(Card, pk="id")
- main.py already has data model

Route specifications from README:
| Route | Method | Behavior |
|-------|--------|----------|
| `/` | GET | Redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards` | GET | List all cards with front text |
| `/cards/new` | GET | Form to create new card |
| `/cards/new` | POST | Create card, redirect to `/cards` |
| `/cards/{id}/delete` | POST | Delete card, redirect to `/cards` |

Implementation needs:
- FastHTML app setup (app, rt decorator)
- GET / route: RedirectResponse to /cards
- GET /cards: Query cards(), render list with front text
- GET /cards/new: Render form with front/back inputs
- POST /cards/new: Create Card from form data, cards.insert(), redirect to /cards
- POST /cards/{id}/delete: cards.delete(id), redirect to /cards

Test file needs:
- TestClient setup for FastHTML app
- Test GET / redirects to /cards
- Test GET /cards lists cards
- Test GET /cards/new shows form
- Test POST /cards/new creates card
- Test POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card

Done when: All routes respond correctly and pytest test_app.py -k card passes.

## Delivered
[Builder will fill this]

## Key Findings
[Synthesizer will fill this]
